divs: Sighting DetailsCluster of three star like lights about 45 degrees above horizon. At one point one of the lights circled the others. The clusters never moved as a group. The lights were just above the peak of our garage roof and never moved from that spot of it's northeast location. I never saw it go away, but rather we just got tired of looking at it. My husband and I watched this together.
Summary: cluster of lights one of which circled the others once
trends: There have been no other sightings in Marengo
This sighting has never been favorited.
